product.title: Apple Iphone 11 Pro Max
product.information: The Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max 5G comes with a 6.7-inch ProMotion technology touchscreen, features Crash Detection and a new Truedepth 48-megapixel front camera with Photonic Engine, an extra hour of video playback compared to last year's model and a new Action mode that provides smoother looking videos with better image stabilization.This is all powered by the Apple A16 Bionic chipset and 6GB of RAM.
